posts.post_title: N284 Buchner Gold Coin King Kelly (Boston) for Sale....SOLD!!
posts.post_content:

For a fairly recent comp (Dec 2023), here's a Kelly in a similar grade, though nicer than this one, which went for $1872 - [url]https://sterlingsportsauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=75462[/url]
